#Subset by Site
Going to use ColonyLevel data to avoid all the fission/fusion confusion
```{r}
MAISIOK01 <- subset(ColonyLevel, Site=="MAI_SIO_K01")
View(MAISIOK01)

KUROCC010 <- subset(ColonyLevel, Site=="KUR_OCC_010")

```
